channel.title: Help with Loyality Titles 639
channel.description:
Well i have followed the instructions those are they: Open up PlayerUpdate Class and look for
appearanceData.writeByte(hash); int title = 0;
Under that add this
if (p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("UserName")) { title = 1; //Title ID }
title = 1; Junior Cadet title = 2; Serjeant title = 3; Commander title = 4; War-Chief [size=14pt][b]But when i compile and run it works fine, then i log in and i see no "Commander" or "Junior Cadet" in my chatbox, i only see my name: Terminator it should be Command Terminator, but i don't get this?[/b][/size]

item.title: Help with Loyality Titles 639
item.dc:creator: @perryman perryman
item.description:
@perryman wrote:

Yeah but i wanna test them, looking how they are like…
Got any answer why i dont see em on chatbox?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Loyality Titles 639
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

[quote=“perryman, post:1, topic:432575”]Well i have followed the instructions those are they:

Open up PlayerUpdate Class and look for

[quote]appearanceData.writeByte(hash);
int title = 0;[/quote]

Under that add this

[quote]if (p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“UserName”)) {
title = 1; //Title ID
}[/quote]

title = 1; Junior Cadet
title = 2; Serjeant
title = 3; Commander
title = 4; War-Chief

[size=14pt]But when i compile and run it works fine, then i log in and i see no “Commander” or “Junior Cadet” in my chatbox, i only see my name: Terminator it should be Command Terminator, but i don’t get this?[/size][/quote]

Like i told dont add em, they are just for a look, no need.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Loyality Titles 639
item.dc:creator: @perryman perryman
item.description:
@perryman wrote:

Well i have followed the instructions those are they:

Open up PlayerUpdate Class and look for

appearanceData.writeByte(hash); int title = 0;

Under that add this

if (p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("UserName")) { title = 1; //Title ID }

title = 1; Junior Cadet
title = 2; Serjeant
title = 3; Commander
title = 4; War-Chief

[size=14pt]But when i compile and run it works fine, then i log in and i see no “Commander” or “Junior Cadet” in my chatbox, i only see my name: Terminator it should be Command Terminator, but i don’t get this?[/size]

Read full topic
